readme:
# AWS - EC2 - REST ## Overview Project for use cases around AWS EC2 using REST protocol Add Ingress Rule to Security Group - AWS - EC2 - REST Create and Attach Internet Gateway - AWS - EC2 - REST Create EC2 Instance - AWS - EC2 - REST Create Route - AWS - EC2 - REST Create Security Group with Ingress Rules - AWS - EC2 - REST Create VPC - AWS - EC2 - REST Create VPC Subnet - AWS - EC2 - REST Provision VPC with Networking - AWS - EC2 - REST Delete Security Groups by VPC - AWS - EC2 - REST Delete Subnets by VPC - AWS - EC2 - REST Destroy VPC and EC2 Instance - AWS - EC2 - REST Detach and Delete Internet Gateways by VPC - AWS - EC2 - REST ## External Dependencies No external dependencies required to run this Workflow Project. ## Adapters
Name Version
adapter-aws_ec2 0.6.9
